sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose that \(m \neq n \) and also \(m : n \) is the duplicate ratio of \((m + o )\), and \((n + o )\). Then prove that the number \(o \) is the mean proportional between \(m \), and \(n \). 
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "$$\text{
It is given that}$$ 
\[
	\frac{m }{n } = \frac{(m + o )^2 }{(n + o )^2 }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow m (n + o )^2 = n (m + o )^2
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	m (n ^2 + o ^2 + 2no ) = n (m ^2 + o ^2 + 2mo )
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow mn ^2 + mo ^2 = m ^2 n + no ^2 
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": " 
\[
	\Rightarrow mo ^2 - no ^2 - m ^2 n + mn ^2 = 0
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow o ^2(m - n ) - mn (m - n ) = 0
\]
\[
	(o ^2 - mn )(m - n ) = 0
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "$$\text{
Since we are already given that $m \neq n $, we can write that}$$
\[
	o ^2 - mn = 0
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow o = \sqrt{mn }
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "$$\text{
So, we can write that $o $ is the mean proportion of the two numbers $m $, and $n $.

Hence proved.
\newline
}$$
"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Upon cross-multiplication of the above equation we get $m (n + o )^2 = n (m + o )^2$.}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Upon opening the brackets and cancelling the common terms from both sides we get $mn ^2 + mo ^2 = m ^2 n + no ^2$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Brnging all the terms on the LHS we get $mo ^2 - no ^2 - m ^2 n + mn ^2 = 0$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Upon factorizing the aove equation we get $(o ^2 - mn )(m - n ) = 0$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Since $m \neq n $, we can equate $o ^2 - mn = 0$, resulting in $o = \sqrt{mn }$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
